sent.orig: Arrive late once more and (ie If you arrive late once more) you're fired.
sent.trans: 你再迟到一次，就把你开除。

sent.orig: Her client from India, arrive Indonesian, arrive again Euramerican, have enclothe.
sent.trans: 她的客户从印度，到印尼，再到欧美，都有覆盖。

sent.orig: The groom will arrive first and wait with his retinue for the bride to arrive.
sent.trans: 新郎会先行到场，并和他的随员一起等待新娘的到来。

sent.orig: Arrive back home. End of Peru Journey.
sent.trans: 抵达温暖的家。结束此一精彩的南美洲之旅。

sent.orig: What will the weather be like when we arrive at Seoul?
sent.trans: 我们到达汉城时，那里的天气会怎么样？
